name: FlashBriefService
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: This Flash Brief Skill allows Alexa to read the latest 5 posts submitted. You can sign up free for this service, and utilize it to quickly and easily get Flash Briefs setup for Alexa.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
